function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Globalization leading to increased movement of people and goods, and rapid dissemination of ideas, increasing the potential for transmission of the growth and spread of new microorganisms.","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Intrusion of technology into immediate workspace","category":"Access to infrastructure  ","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Confounding factors such as industrial relations climate, staff morale, and personal issues influencing how occupants rate their workplace environment.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjective evaluations of indoor environments by occupants may not align with objective measures, leading to discrepancies in assessing indoor environmental quality.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential bias introduced by the use of buzzsumo in the
